code: import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import mycontext from'./Context/Createcontext';import Alertcontext from'./Context/AlertContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Inputform(){const{AddNote}=useContext(mycontext);const{Checkalert}=useContext(Alertcontext);const[data,setData]=useState({price:"",work:""});const Change=e=>{setData({...data,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const hendlesubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();AddNote(data.price,data.work);setData({price:"",work:""});Checkalert('Your Work Note Successfully Added in Our Data..!','Success');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"myform container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3 ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"formGroupExampleInput",className:"form-label mylebal",children:"Price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"form-control myinput",id:"formGroupExampleInput",name:"price",value:data.price,onChange:Change,placeholder:"Enter a Single Pice Diomond Price"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"formGroupExampleInput2",className:"form-label mylebal",children:"Made Diomond"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"form-control myinput",id:"formGroupExampleInput2",name:"work",value:data.work,onChange:Change,placeholder:"Total Made Diomonds"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button ",className:"btn workbtn",disabled:data.price.length===0||data.work.length===0,onClick:hendlesubmit,children:"ADD WORK"})]});}export default Inputform;
